CustomField.description: One Application (Any other applications, don't allow creation) One Application Per Term (Only one application for the selected term) One Application Per Program (Only one application for the selected program) One Application Per Term Per Program (Only one application for the selected term and selected program) ~Blank~ No Restrictions
CustomField.label: Number of Applications Limit
